mapper.sql: id, title, description, create_time, is_del, article_type_id, user_id
mapper.select:
select a.id, a.title, a.description, a.create_time as createTime, a.is_del as isDel, a.article_type_id as articleTypeId, a.user_id as userId from article a left join `user` u on a.user_id = u.id where a.is_del = 0 and u.is_del = 0
and u.username like concat("%",#{username},"%")
and title like concat("%",#{title},"%")
order by a.create_time desc

select id,title,description,content,create_time,is_del,article_type_id,user_id,cover,article_tags from article where article.is_del = 0
and FIND_IN_SET(#{typeId},article_type_id)
order by create_time desc
